Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: RKM Oracle COMPONENT VERSION: 10.1.3.6 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: 10.1.3.5.0 and above
DESCRIPTION This KM retrieves the table and view structures in Oracle (columns, primary keys, alternate keys and references). This KM works for Oracle databases for Oracle versions 7.3 and later.
REQUIREMENTS Required privileges for the connection user: SELECT on any dictionnary view ALL_* (eg. ALL_TABLES)
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - COMPATIBLE: Enable different features depending on the version of the reversed database - VAIDATE: Enable an automatic validation of the options specified for the KM

This option enables the reverse of INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND and INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH datatypes.
Values INTERVAL types reversed 9 Yes 8 No
It is recommended to use 9 on Oracle 9i and above.
This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_TYPE, :TABLE_DESC, '1', :R_COUNT )

Select t.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, t.TABLE_NAME RES_NAME, replace(t.TABLE_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, substr(tc.COMMENTS,1,250) TABLE_DESC, 'T' TABLE_TYPE, t.NUM_ROWS R_COUNT From ALL_TABLES t, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS tc Where t.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and tc.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tc.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0
union
Select s.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, s.SYNONYM_NAME RES_NAME, replace(s.SYNONYM_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, substr('<<SYNONYM FOR TABLE: ' || T.OWNER || '.' || T.TABLE_NAME || '>> ' || tc.COMMENTS,1,250) TABLE_DESC, 'SY' TABLE_TYPE, t.NUM_ROWS R_COUNT From ALL_TABLES t, ALL_SYNONYMS s, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS tc Where s.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and s.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and t.OWNER = s.TABLE_OWNER and t.TABLE_NAME = s.TABLE_NAME and tc.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tc.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0

Insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( I_MOD, RES_NAME, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_DESC, TABLE_TYPE, IND_SHOW ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_DESC, 'V', '1' )

Select v.VIEW_NAME TABLE_NAME, v.VIEW_NAME RES_NAME, substr(v.VIEW_NAME,1,3) TABLE_ALIAS, substr(vc.COMMENTS,1,250) TABLE_DESC From ALL_VIEWS v, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS vc, ALL_OBJECTS o Where v.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and v.VIEW_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and vc.OWNER(+) = v.OWNER and vc.TABLE_NAME(+) = v.VIEW_NAME and o.OWNER = v.OWNER and o.OBJECT_NAME = v.VIEW_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_HEADING, COL_DESC, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_HEADING, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '1', '1' )

select c.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, <% if ("8".equals(odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE"))) {%> c.DATA_TYPE DT_DRIVER, <% } else { %> case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL DAY(%) TO SECOND(%)' then 'INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL YEAR(%) TO MONTH' then 'INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0)' then 'TIMESTAMP(0)' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)' then 'TIMESTAMP' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' else c.DATA_TYPE end DT_DRIVER, <% } %> substr(c.COLUMN_NAME,1,35) COL_HEADING, substr(cc.COMMENTS,1,250) COL_DESC, c.COLUMN_ID POS, case when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' then c.DATA_PRECISION when C.DATA_TYPE = 'CHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NCHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NVARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then c.DATA_SCALE else nvl(c.DATA_PRECISION,c.DATA_LENGTH) end LONGC, case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then NULL else c.DATA_SCALE end SCALEC, decode(c.NULLABLE,'Y','0','1') COL_MANDATORY from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS c, ALL_COL_COMMENTS cc, ALL_OBJECTS o Where o.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ( ( o.OBJECT_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and o.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 ) or ( o.OBJECT_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and o.OBJECT_TYPE = 'VIEW' and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 ) ) and cc.OWNER(+) = c.OWNER and cc.TABLE_NAME(+) = c.TABLE_NAME and cc.COLUMN_NAME(+) = c.COLUMN_NAME and o.OWNER = c.OWNER and o.OBJECT_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME
union
select s.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, <% if ("8".equals(odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE"))) {%> c.DATA_TYPE DT_DRIVER, <% } else { %> case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL DAY(%) TO SECOND(%)' then 'INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL YEAR(%) TO MONTH' then 'INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0)' then 'TIMESTAMP(0)' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)' then 'TIMESTAMP' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' else c.DATA_TYPE end DT_DRIVER, <% } %> substr(c.COLUMN_NAME,1,35) COL_HEADING, substr(cc.COMMENTS,1,250) COL_DESC, c.COLUMN_ID POS, case when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' then c.DATA_PRECISION when C.DATA_TYPE = 'CHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NCHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NVARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then c.DATA_SCALE else nvl(c.DATA_PRECISION,c.DATA_LENGTH) end LONGC, case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then NULL else c.DATA_SCALE end SCALEC, decode(c.NULLABLE,'Y','0','1') COL_MANDATORY from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS c, ALL_COL_COMMENTS cc, ALL_SYNONYMS s Where s.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and s.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and cc.OWNER(+) = c.OWNER and cc.TABLE_NAME(+) = c.TABLE_NAME and cc.COLUMN_NAME(+) = c.COLUMN_NAME and s.TABLE_OWNER = c.OWNER and s.TABLE_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN ( I_MOD, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, 'D', :SCHEMA_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '1' )

select fk.owner FK_USER_NAME, fk.table_name TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, pk.owner PK_USER_NAME, pk.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk where fk.constraint_type ='R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL ( I_MOD, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :POS )

select fk.table_name FK_TABLE_NAME, pkc.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, substr(fkc.column_name,1,35) FK_COL_NAME, pkc.column_name PK_COL_NAME, fkc.position POS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_cons_columns fkc, all_cons_columns pkc where fk.constraint_type = 'R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.owner = fk.r_owner and pkc.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.position = fkc.position and fkc.owner = fk.owner and fkc.constraint_name = fk.constraint_name

# Validating KM options <%
/* Validate COMPATIBLE */ if (!( "8".equals( odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE") ) || "9".equals( odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE") ) || "10".equals( odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE") ) || "11".equals( odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE") ) )) { %> raise "\nInvalid value for RKM option COMPATIBLE.\nFound <%=odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE")%> while expecting 8 to 11." <% } %>

Select table_name CK_TABLE_NAME, constraint_name CK_NAME, search_condition CK_COND, 'Invalid '||constraint_name CK_MESS From all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type ='C' and constraint_name not like 'SYS%'

Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME CK_TABLE_NAME, constraint_name CK_NAME, search_condition CK_COND, 'Invalid '||constraint_name CK_MESS From all_constraints c, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.owner = SY.TABLE_OWNER and c.table_name = SY.TABLE_NAME and c.constraint_type = 'C' and constraint_name not like 'SYS%'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

Select c.table_name TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME From all_constraints c where c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U')
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

Select c.table_name TABLE_NAME, co.constraint_name KEY_NAME, co.column_name COL_NAME, co.position POS From all_cons_columns co, all_constraints c where co.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and co.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and co.owner = c.owner and co.table_name = c.table_name and co.owner = c.owner and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and co.constraint_name = c.constraint_name
insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

Select i.table_name TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, decode(i.UNIQUENESS,'UNIQUE','AK','I') CONS_TYPE From all_indexes i, all_objects o where i.owner ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and i.uniqueness = 'UNIQUE' and o.owner = i.owner and o.object_name = i.index_name and o.object_type = 'INDEX' and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') )
Get columns for keys from indexes
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

Select ic.table_name TABLE_NAME, ic.index_name KEY_NAME, ic.column_name COL_NAME, ic.column_position POS From all_ind_columns ic, all_indexes i where ic.index_owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ic.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ic.index_owner = i.owner and ic.table_name = i.table_name and ic.index_name = i.index_name and i.uniqueness = 'UNIQUE' and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c Where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') )
